passive.name: Departing Anew
passive.description: After the wearer uses Skill or Ultimate on one ally character, the wearer regenerates <orangeStrong>{{1, fixed(fixed: 1)}}</orangeStrong> Energy and the ability's target receives 1 stack of "Hymn" for {{4}} turn(s), stacking up to {{3}} time(s). Each stack of "Hymn" increases its holder's DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. After every {{5}} instance(s) of Skill or Ultimate the wearer uses on one ally character, recovers 1 Skill Point.
